subject: Re: You Tube Video and Audio
author: Allen
full_text:
The antenna on Rosemary's Mini-Box is simply a telescoping antenna
like off an AM/FM radio attached to a banana plug.  The antenna unit
loosely plugs into the top of the wire antenna connector on the
Mini-Box.  That antenna was on prototype #3, the first demonstration
model, but dropped in favor of a wire antenna on the production models.

Allen Slaughter
www.paranormalsource.com


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "rosemary_guiley" <reguiley@...> wrote:
>
> It's a fold-down antenna I got from Ron Ricketts, the creator of the
> Mini, via April Slaughter, who arranged for me to get the first
> commercially available box.  It's not part of the package that comes
> with the Mini.  A wire antenna works too.  I don't always use it --
> depends on the reception.
> 
> Rosemary
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, psfponies <psfponies@> wrote:
> >
> > Rosemary
> >  
> > What kind of antenna are you using with your mini box?
> > Kay
> >  
> > 
> >
